description:
Does your job involve selling? Would you like to increase your numbers by eliminating the different negative qualities in you ?Then this is the course that will help you make that happen.

The present course will help you :
  • learn the winning qualities you must posses
  • learn and overcome different types of weaknesses to close sales effectively.
  • learn and understand different types of motives necessary in sales training.
    • learn the essential negative qualities necessary to overcome to boost sales
The present course is all about learning the 9 negative qualities you must overcome to boost sales.

The course pays special attention to the requirements of sales executives , marketing managers who want to become a winning sales professional and increase their sales rapidly.
title: How To Become A Winning Sales Professional : Lite Edition
